mapper.select:
select cr.`id` as id, cr.`remind_date` as remind_date, cr.`type` as type, cr.`link_name` as link_name, cr.`link_phone` as link_phone, cr.`count` as count, cr.`day` as day, cr.`remark` as remark, cr.`dispose` as dispose, cr.`client_id` as client_id, c.`corp_name` as corp_name, p.`name` as product_name from `client_remind` cr left join `client` c on cr.`client_id` = c.`id` left join `product` p on cr.`product_id` = p.`id`
cr.`user_id` = #{managerId} and cr.`type` = #{type} and cr.`remind_date` = #{date} and cr.`dispose` = #{dispose}
